channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge issues temporary injunction against Trump administration cancellation of humanities grants
“Do they think we’re babies?” the podcaster asked, referring to the administration’s flip-flop on Epstein.
Examining reports Texas man who moved family to Russia died in Ukraine war
Sharknado? The next generation of hurricane forecasters could be sharks
Trump admin live updates: RFK to axe members of preventive health panel, source says
item.description: Questions over the Jeffrey Epstein probe continue to follow the president as he visits Scotland.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump does not rule out pardon for Ghislaine Maxwell
item.description: President Trump initially dodged the question about the possibility of granting clemency for convicted Jeffrey Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell aft...

item.title: Maxwell had limited immunity during meetings with deputy AG: Sources
item.description: A second meeting between Jeffrey Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell and Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche took place on Friday for about three hou...

item.title: WATCH: Cat memorizes route home from bomb shelter in Ukraine
item.description: A cat in Odesa, Ukraine, memorized the route to and from a bomb shelter in an apartment building.

item.title: 7/25: The Daily Report
item.description: Kelly O'Grady reports on President Trump's Scotland trip as he faces questions about Jeffrey Epstein, sentencing in the "doomsday mom" case and more.

item.title: 7/25: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: Extreme weather slams U.S. with dangerous heat and flash floods. Also, an ethics expert weighs in on advances in DNA.

item.title: Suspect taken into custody in University of New Mexico shooting that left 1 dead
item.description: The University of New Mexico campus has been shut down and students were told to shelter in place after an early morning shooting Friday.

item.title: 7/25: CBS Evening News
item.description: DOJ's closed-door meetings with Ghislaine Maxwell fuels pardon speculation; Bighorn lambs spotted after rescue from disease threat that decimated Texa...

item.title: More than 20% of NASA's workforce requests to leave agency
item.description: About 3,870 employees have applied to depart NASA over two rounds through the Trump administration's deferred resignation program, the agency disclose...

item.title: WATCH: France to recognize the state of Palestine, Macron says
item.description: France will officially recognize the state of Palestine, "true to its historic commitment to a just and lasting peace in the Middle East," French Pres...

item.title: A 59-Year-Old Career Nurse Feels 'Defeated And Cooked' After Learning Her Coworker Has Saved Nearly $500,000 More For Retirement
A man is stopped climbing the US-Mexico border wall. Under new Trump rules, US troops sound the alarm
Southwest Airlines flight headed to Las Vegas takes dramatic plunge in response to nearby aircraft
In Epstein furor, Trump struggles to shake off a controversy his allies once stoked
item.description: President Donald Trump faces ongoing questions about the Jeffrey Epstein case, overshadowing his administration’s achievements.
